September 3, 1957
Mr. Kenneth L. Yourd
Educational Television and Radio Center
2320 Washtenaw Avenue
Ann Arbor, Michigan
Dear Kent
Upon returning from my vacation last week, I found your
letter of August 8 relative to the Kent State proposal of
Ralph Hall.
Thank you very much for the time and thought you put
on this. I notice that you have sent carbons to Skornia,
Hill and Underwood. I am writing In this same mail to
Skornia about this. We should soon work out some arrangements
with Kent State, or els© decide net to do so.
Thank you again for your advice.
Yours sine rely.
Burton Paulu
President
BPikls
CC* Harry J. Skornia
